[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_wp_custommenu title="Categories" nav_menu="91"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_wp_custommenu title="My Account" nav_menu="49"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_wp_custommenu title="Pages" nav_menu="50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text]

About

We’re a fashion/apparel/sports store for the whole family! We have all subjects for outdoor activities - from the most basic sporting goods to the last generation technological equipment. It also plays an important role that we have an online store. Now, no matter where you live – our products are always there, turning on the computer will be enough! A high-quality goods with a reasonable price – in such a way you can describe our approach to the formation of commodity policy that we are implementing for recent years. We carefully select suppliers, sifting unreasonably expensive, and supporting those who share our views. Consultants prompt the optimal solution for each client, based on its needs and the level of sports training. Customer’s interests have always been for us on the first place. For regular customers we have a system of privileges. In addition, participants of special programs regularly receive special offers and discounts on services.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

584.title: About
584.content:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1486430152307{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8"][vc_column_text]

Economize on a healthy way of life is no longer necessary: sport is now truly available to anyone!

Sport is not only the will, the strength, the desire. It is also the right equipment; and it’s in front of you. Nowadays to buy soundly sports shoes and sportswear is not so simple: besides the veneer of consumer goods hides a dubious quality. That’s why our mission is developing a successful and efficient business by offering customers the best range of quality products for sports and leisure activities, while maintaining the highest level of service.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1486430450618{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="778" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1485134211414{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #222222 !important;}" el_class="dark-row"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1486430569147{padding-bottom: 17px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Interesting Facts

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][info_list position="top" icon_bg_color="" icon_color="#fc6f38" font_size_icon="76" connector_color="rgba(51,51,51,0.01)" el_class="icon-top-left"][info_list_item list_title="What do experts say?" list_icon="myfont-t-shirt" desc_font_size="desktop:18px;" desc_font_line_height="desktop:26px;" title_font_size="desktop:26px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:37px;"]The effectiveness of training, according to many experts, is directly dependent on the quality sportswear. You can wear designer suits, brag about their high-quality embroidered logo on the t-shirt or wear a stylish and tight synthetics. But what is it all if you're in a sports suit that is not comfortable?[/info_list_item][/info_list][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][info_list position="top" icon_bg_color="" icon_color="#fc6f38" font_size_icon="76" connector_color="rgba(51,51,51,0.01)" el_class="icon-top-left"][info_list_item list_title="Coco Chanel – a legislator of sports fashion." list_icon="myfont-thumbs-up" desc_font_size="desktop:18px;" desc_font_line_height="desktop:26px;" title_font_size="desktop:26px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:37px;"]One of the fiercest advocates of comfortable clothing for women was Coco Chanel, began to create a ladies' suits from jersey, and stated that a woman can wear pants, comfortable shoes, to borrow the model of the male wardrobe, swim at the beach in the open bathing suit, sunbathing, outdoor recreation and exercise.[/info_list_item][/info_list][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][info_list position="top" icon_bg_color="" icon_color="#fc6f38" font_size_icon="76" connector_color="rgba(51,51,51,0.01)" el_class="icon-top-left"][info_list_item list_title="What is the benefit to run in our sportswear?" list_icon="myfont-megaphone" desc_font_size="desktop:18px;" desc_font_line_height="desktop:26px;" title_font_size="desktop:26px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:37px;"]Training in the cold season well tempers the body, increases immunity, improves your health. Against the background of short days in winter running charges the body with vigor, while running produced hormones of joy. In addition, it increases self-control and self-esteem.[/info_list_item][/info_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1486430997512{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1486430959022{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

More than once we ordered at this store sportswear

All of excellent quality, delivery on time and no cheating! I advise all doubters to buy through the store, and you will be satisfied with not only the product quality and delivery times, but also the work of the administrators

Anis Anderson

The quality of clothes is quite good: There are neat stitches; most of the models look good on the figure; also it has a large assortment of colors and patterns. And if we look at the relatively low price, you can close your eyes on small flaws of this store.

Isabella Butler

586.title: Answers to your Questions
586.content:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1486431503875{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8" css=".vc_custom_1485128457568{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1485127349162{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"]

Orders

[/vc_column_text][vc_toggle title="How do I place an order?" el_id="1485126421297-85644689-ea1e"]If you have chosen a favorite sporting goods, then click "Add to cart", and it will automatically be placed in your shopping cart. You can then continue to select products in our online store, adding to your shopping cart as sporting goods, as needed.If you have already completed the selection of sporting goods, then proceed directly to checkout.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How can I cancel or change my order?" el_id="1485126449255-38a06588-391a"]Carefully check the contents of your basket. You can change the number of instances of the product or remove individual items by simply pressing the "Recalculate". Further, if all selected correctly, click the "Checkout". On the next step enter personal information (contacts, name, shipping address). You will then check the entered information and click "Send." In the nearest future our manager will contact with you, to clarify again the data and confirm your order.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What I have to consider in the process of order? " el_id="1485126491046-5ec14c25-2ebe"]When ordering, specify the actual phone number and shipping address in your account, otherwise the carrier will not be able to reach you and your order will be canceled. Depending on the size and weight of your goods as well as the delivery address specified in your account, you will be offered the available delivery methods. The term of delivery and the cost of courier delivery is calculated automatically by the system depending on your address, weight and size of your order, and the courier company that delivers to your region.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What is important in the receipt of an order?" el_id="1485126516147-76077fc7-ddf9"]Turn on the phone during the delivery day - so the courier can contact you. Upon receipt of the order before payment is required to check the conformity of the goods in the parcel, and completeness of the goods, the courier is to wait until you will check. Fitting and partial redemption not carried out.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Who should I contact if I have any questions?" el_id="1485126569278-8adf0c1b-4892"]In case of any problems with the completeness of the order, please contact our Contact Center by phone +777 2345 785 or e-mail: info@mydomain.com. Our team will help you solve the problem quickly.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="I don’t want to buy this item now, but I also don’t want to forget it. What should I do?" el_id="1485126653124-2d03ebf9-38e1"]You can click the "add to favorites" and item will be added to "your desires". In that case you can return to it purchase later.[/vc_toggle][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1485127470615{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"]

Orders

[/vc_column_text][vc_toggle title="Payment methods" el_id="1485126888150-95a72457-03d1"]Our shop supports multiple payment methods: In the case of delivery by courier items can be paid in cash or by card (MasterCard, Visa). You can pay by bank transfer. Through payment terminals, eWallets, cellular operators.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_type="bg_color" css=".vc_custom_1486433050636{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Any unanswered questions? Contact Us

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

698.title: Services
698.content:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1486433843732{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-12"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1485136507522{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"]

The correct choice of sports equipment is the key to successful and roductive training that will lead to inner harmony and outer perfection.

That's why our professional consultants will be happy to be for you the guide in the huge world of sporting goods, and certainly support you in the process of choice of the optimal variant, which will satisfy all your requirements.

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="702" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" gap="35" el_class="row-with-counters" css=".vc_custom_1486998147787{padding-top: 63px !important;padding-bottom: 56px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]

Adequate prices.

Prices to all gods in our online store is less that in the real one. This is due to the lack of rent premises, salary of consultants and other vendors.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]

ideal balance between price & quality.

We sell only original products, and a wide range of sporting goods will satisfy even the most demanding customers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]

Saving of time.

Now you don't need to spend a huge amount of time to walk to shops and to choose products - everything will be brought to you at home

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-12" css=".vc_custom_1486434734904{padding-bottom: 53px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

What we do

Comfort and convenience are basic principles of our company. Our sports supermarket expands the boundaries of your opportunities, and helps you to purchase goods that will help you achieve new heights. We strive to bring our customers for a new level of training, and rejoice with you for each your professional achievements or small personal victory.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1485201188500{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"][interactive_banner icon_disp="with_description" banner_image="id^1077|url^http://wowmall.tonytemplates.com/dummy-light/instagram/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/banner-22.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^banner-22|description^null" link_opts="more" banner_link="url:%2Fshop%2F|||" banner_link_text="Shop now!" banner_link_bg_color="#fc6f38" banner_style="style13" banner_overlay_bg_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.6)" el_class="banner-only-button"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1485201053511{margin-top: -14px !important;}"]
